history.narrative: Law 9-164 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-541, which was retained by CounciL. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 23, 1992, and July 7, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 21, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-259 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-164 became effective on September 29, 1992.
